lom:description.lom:string: Audio educational and inspirational radio stories about fascinating women working in fields and careers related to science, engineering or technology. Find out more about programs working to encourage young girls and women to follow in their footsteps.

lom:keyword.lom:string: women in scence, women in engineering, gender equity

lom:title.lom:string: Women In Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics ON THE AIR!
